list_definition.definition: a boy or girl who goes to school

list_ex_of_english: Schoolmasters who are harsh with schoolboys, who later as a result burn down the school house, ought to be more human.
I object to the idea of seamen being treated like schoolboys.
Still further to improve it, we let schoolboys put on a miniature policeman's uniform and stand beside the traffic policeman to direct the traffic.
Schoolboys in any case are at present treated with an indescribable severity which crushes their spirits and leaves them unnourished.
The schoolboys were not particularly concerned about his beastliness.
I won this book 50 years ago in a schoolboy's competition.
Could we not perhaps have some girls employed on this sort of thing, or even teenage schoolboys?
How are we to try to persuade schoolboys to make the proper choice?
